law.catch_line: Promotions for positions created under KRS 16.187.

text.section: There shall be no discrimination based on race, sex, age, national origin, color, religion, creed, or political affiliation with respect to the department promotional system. All personnel actions are to be based solely on merit.

law.history: Created 2009 Ky. Acts ch. 75, sec. 6, effective June 25, 2009.
